item.title: Installing Litecoin in Tails
item.description: Installing Litecoin in Tails To start make sure you have persistent volume and dot files enabled. If you do not have both setup and enabled make sure you do a reset after enabling them. Next we need to download the Linux app image from https://electrum-ltc.org/ Once the download has finished make sure you move the app image file to either Tor Browser (Persistent) Or your Persistent folder.
